job_tasks.phrase: Redesign and optimize Kafka streaming components to enhance performance metrics.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves optimizing existing infrastructure components (Kafka streaming) for better performance, which falls under the operational management and tuning of systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and upgrade application components to support near real-time data processing.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the creation and modification of application parts, a core aspect of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Ensure daily monitoring, maintenance, and debugging of all components to maintain stability and consistency.
job_tasks.justification: These activities (monitoring, maintenance, debugging) are key responsibilities for ensuring the ongoing health and stability of operational systems.

soft_skills.phrase: optimize Kafka streaming components to enhance performance metrics
debugging of all components to maintain stability and consistency

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional software development and operations engineering tasks, primarily related to data streaming with Kafka. There is no mention of generative AI models, LLMs, or related concepts, making it not align with the GenAI Engineer profile.
